name: Pef Needs To Go Deeper
description:
Pef Needs To Go Deeper : a Prototype

Pef needs to go deeper! Explore the caves, try to go fast and take care of the terrible larva!

Controls : 

Move : Left and right arrows
Jump : Up arrow
Dash (to break planks and some rocks) : Spacebar
Pause (switch in and out) : P

An Alakajam game made by : 
Thibaut Husson and Frédéric Gondeau - Graphical Team
William Benichou and Maxime Richard - Development Team
